m.comment: Value for height and width of the Icon component.

l.comment: Value for height and width of the large Icon component.

xl.comment: Value for height and width of the extra-large Icon component.

fill-color.comment: Value for the fill property of the Icon component.

stroke-color.comment: Value for the stroke property of the Icon component.

stroke-width.comment: Value for the stroke-width property of the Icon component.

l-stroke.comment: Value for the stroke property of the large Icon component.

custom-stroke-width-l.comment: Value for the stroke-width property of the large Icon component.

xl-stroke.comment: Value for the stroke property of the extra large Icon component.

custom-stroke-width-xl.comment: Value for the stroke-width property of the extra large Icon component.

filled-fill-color.comment: Value for the fill property of the Filled Icon component.

filled-stroke-color.comment: Value for the stroke property of the Filled Icon component..
